Beasts

Amidst the Ancient Trees

What is the page number for 'Chaosium Pronunciations of Mythos Names'?

What is the page number for 'Beasts'?

What does H.P. Lovecraft consider the most merciful thing in the world?
The inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents.
You are a helpful assistant.
According to Lovecraft, what is the result of the piecing together of dissociated knowledge?
It will either go mad from the revelation or flee from the light into the peace and safety of a new dark age.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the author of the text 'The Call of Cthulhu'?
H.P. Lovecraft
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the theme of the game 'Call of Cthulhu'?
Exploring mysteries, uncovering foul plots, and standing against terrors
You are a helpful assistant.
What kind of entities can be encountered in the game?
sanity-blasting entities, monsters, and insane cultists
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the potential outcome of the player's decision?
the fate of the world
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is the creator of the Call of Cthulhu roleplaying game?
Howard Phillips Lovecraft
You are a helpful assistant.
What literary genres does Lovecraft's fiction range from?
Science fiction, gothic horror, and nihilistic cosmic terror
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is Lovecraft recognized as today?
a major American horror story writer of the twentieth century
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Lovecraft's most famous invention known as?
the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful assistant.
What genre of fiction does Lovecraft's work range from?
science fiction, gothic horror, and nihilistic cosmic terror
You are a helpful assistant.
What is known as Lovecraft's most famous invention?
The Cthulhu Mythos
